org.jlinalg.field_p
Class FieldPLongFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.jlinalg.RingElementFactory<FieldP>
      org.jlinalg.field_p.FieldPAbstractFactory
          org.jlinalg.field_p.FieldPLongFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
IRingElementFactory<FieldP>
public class FieldPLongFactory
extends FieldPAbstractFactory

An implementation of a factory for FieldP's using "long"s as internal number type.

Author:
Andreas Lochbihler, Georg Thimm, Andreas Keilhauer

Deprecated. 

Description copied from interface: IRingElementFactory
Returns a random value RE with distribution N(0, 1)
Note! Normal Distribution Issue
For the following RingElement types this method won't achieve the correct distribution: F2, FieldP
